organic.title: Rockstar Games Announces Grand Theft Auto VI, Coming ...
organic.snippet: (NASDAQ: TTWO), is proud to announce that Grand Theft Auto VI is coming to PlayStation® 5 computer entertainment systems and Xbox Series X|S games and entertainment systems in 2025. This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20231204993583/en/.

organic.snippet: Set for release on October 7th in North America and.
